title: Venus Transit in Sixth House: Balance in Service, Health, and Relationships
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Venus transiting the sixth house brings refinement to daily work, service, and health routines. Relationships at the workplace require diplomacy and balance, helping resolve conflicts through calm communication. This phase supports improving habits, aesthetics in workspaces, and cooperative problem-solving. Attraction may arise through service or shared responsibilities, but emotional boundaries are necessary. When discipline guides pleasure, Venus here helps restore harmony in duties, health, and everyday interactions.
closing: Venus in the sixth house supports harmony when pleasure is guided by discipline and service.
